subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: The Mets may be better off letting the injured Jose Reyes and the rest of the team focus on 2010 after losing in agonizing and embarrassing fashion to the St. Louis Cardinals in 10 innings Tuesday.
snippet: The Mets may be better off letting the injured Jose Reyes and the rest of the team focus on 2010 after losing in agonizing and embarrassing fashion to the St. Louis Cardinals in 10 innings Tuesday.
